map_info: Cliquer sur un pays pour faire apparaître ses informations
map_title: La privatisation de la santé en Europe
map_sources: Marketbeat: European Nursing Homes Report, Cushman&Wakefield, 2019 ; Hospital  Healthcare Europe, Healthcare Data, 2019 ; Own calculations.
total_beds_per_inhabitants: Nombre total de lits pour 1000 habitants
%_for_profit_beds: Part de lits à but lucratif
operating_margin_def: This indicator refers to what the firm earns on average from each product sold. It is calculated by dividing the operating profit by the revenue.
profit_rate_def: This indicator is the ratio of profit to invested capital; it is calculated by dividing the net profit by the company's equity.
